The number of acres per gardener in New York City is over six times the number of acres per gardener in San Francisco

Number of acres per gardener in

Number of acres per gardener in

New York City

San Francisco

1 square = 1 acre

Total:

20 acres

Total:

133 acres

Note: Data as of 2018

Source: Center for an Urban Future, “A New Leaf” (June 2018)

Graphic by Laya Gollamudi
